message: Let's start fair, Bob. I propose a 50/50 split.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a fairer split.
Bob, I understand your point about inflation, but I think a 60/40 split is more equitable considering we're both losing value. Let's make this happen.
Given the substantial effect of inflation on my share, I believe a 58/42 split is more reasonable at this point.
